H0.text: Which religion uses a domed structure called a Stupa as a shrine. Hindu

H1.text: Which religion uses a domed structure called a Stupa as a shrine. Jain

H2.text: Which religion uses a domed structure called a Stupa as a shrine. Sikh

H3.text: Which religion uses a domed structure called a Stupa as a shrine. Buddh

A4.text: In Buddhism, a stupa is a domed hemispherical structure containing sacred relics and used as a place of pilgrimage and meditation.

A5.text: A Jain stupa was excavated at Mathura in the 19th century.
